message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and the demand I'm seeing, I'm initially setting the price at $14,500. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to consider that?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  While I'm confident in the value of this product, I'm willing to come down a bit to meet you closer to your price point. Would you consider $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my target. Would you be willing to consider $12,200?
